paragraph: Contact the Yocca Law Firms team today.

detailsData.title: Decades of Experience
detailsData.content: With decades of experience in winning difficult cases, the firm successfully litigates with and against the largest multi-national law firms.

detailsData.title: Responsive Service
detailsData.content: The firm combines the depth of experience found in large firms with the responsive service and personalized approach of a small firm.

detailsData.title: Proven Track Record
detailsData.content: The lawyers at the firm have a record of success, including multi-million dollar verdicts and settlements in various cases.

address: 18881 Von Karman Avenue, Suite 1620, Irvine, California 92612
subHeading: A Business and Employment Litigation Firm
valueProp: The Yocca Law Firm LLP is a business and employment litigation firm with decades of experience in winning difficult cases, successfully litigating with and against the largest multi-national law firms. Their lawyers combine the depth of experience found in large firms with the responsive service and personalized approach of a small firm.
CTA: Contact the Yocca Law Firms team today.

testimonalData.text: The Yocca Law Firm LLP provided exceptional legal representation. Their dedication and expertise were truly impressive.

testimonalData.text: Highly recommend the Yocca Law Firm for any complex business litigation. They exceeded all expectations.
